description: Jump into the dynamic world of pop megastar, Gloria Estefan as she takes you behind the scenes on her most recent U.S. and European tour. This program features twelve videos including "Oye," "Don't Stop," "Turn The Beat Around," "Higher," "Everlasting Love," and others, interspersed with interview moments.
